author: bsnyder
msg: Fixed SM-423; Change the AutoDeploymentService.updateExternal(String,boolean) to return an ArchiveEntry.

author: carlos
msg: Copy files also to m2 repo

author: dims
msg: There was a big performance hit because of the repeated loading of zip for every request for a resource.
Specifically when we use XmlBeans databinding as it was loading xsb files from the class loader. Even Caching did not help much (helped a bit).
So the solution for now is to extract the inner jars add them to URLClassLoader (completely eliminated the problem seen in the profiler). Mark the jars to delete on exit to cleanup.
